sentences.en: ‘Can we go to the park?’ ‘No, not today, dear.’
sentences.cn: “我们能去公园吗？”“不，今天不行，亲爱的。”

sentences.en: ‘You don't mind?’ ‘Not at all.’.
sentences.cn: “你不介意吗？”“一点儿也不。”。

sentences.en: "It's not one of my favourite forms of music." — "No."
sentences.cn: “这不是我喜欢的音乐形式。”——“对，这不是。”

sentences.en: But legal experts are not sure if such a charge can stick.
sentences.cn: 但法律专家们不能肯定这一指控是否成立。

sentences.en: Do not wait for good things to happen to you. You need to walk towards happiness.
sentences.cn: 不要等待好事降临，你要向幸福进发。

sentences.en: Driving a boat is not the same as driving a car.
sentences.cn: 驾船和开车不是一回事。

sentences.en: Friendship means understanding, not agreement. It means forgiveness, not forgetting.It means the memories last, even if contact is lost.
sentences.cn: 友情是理解，不是妥协；是原谅，不是遗忘。即使不联系，感情依然在。

sentences.en: He did not like to be caught out on details.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢在细节上被人抓住把柄。

sentences.en: I'll never be allowed back—not that I'd want to go back.
sentences.cn: 我永远不会被允许回去了—并不是我想要回去。

sentences.en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentences.cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。

sentences.en: Issues such as these were not really his concern.
sentences.cn: 他其实并不关心诸如此类的问题。

sentences.en: Most of the stores do not open until 10 am.
sentences.cn: 大多数商店要到上午10点才开始营业。

sentences.en: not but what the picture has its darker side.
sentences.cn: 不过画面也有它较为黑暗的一面。

sentences.en: not but what the picture has its darker side.
sentences.cn: 不过画面也有它较为黑暗的一面。

sentences.en: not but what the picture has its darker side.
sentences.cn: 不过画面也有它较为黑暗的一面。

sentences.en: not but what the picture has its darker side.
sentences.cn: 不过画面也有它较为黑暗的一面。

sentences.en: She’s not a very nice person.
sentences.cn: 她为人不太好。

sentences.en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.--Winston Churchill
sentences.cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

sentences.en: Success is not guaranteed. It is not handed to you. Success is earned.
sentences.cn: 成功无法保证，并非唾手可得。成功必须靠自己去争取。

sentences.en: The blame for the Charleston fiasco did not lie with him.
sentences.cn: 查尔斯顿惨败错不在他。

sentences.en: The criticisms will not stop people flocking to see the film.
sentences.cn: 批评的声音不会阻止人们涌到影院观看这部电影。

sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentences.en: They will not allow your more way-out ideas to pass unchallenged.
sentences.cn: 他们不会放过你这些古怪的念头的。

sentences.en: You were wrong not to inform the police.
sentences.cn: 你没有通知警方是错误的。

sentences.en: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.--Zig Ziglar
sentences.cn: 决定你人生高度的，不是你的才能，而是你的态度。

phrases.tran_cn: vt. 以便不（未到...的程度）

trans.tran_cn: 不，[用以表示否定、否认、拒绝、禁止等]不是，几乎不，未必，没有[用于否定后面的词或短语]
trans.tran_en: used to make a word, statement, or question negative

trans.tran_cn: “非”（计算机中逻辑运算的一种）
